metadata.title: CVE-2017-12937 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS for NVIDIA BlueField (jammy) - low
metadata.description:
The ReadSUNImage function in coders/sun.c in GraphicsMagick 1.3.26 has acolormap heap-based buffer over-read.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12937` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

graphicsmagick - 1.3.26-6
graphicsmagick-imagemagick-compat - 1.3.26-6
libgraphics-magick-perl - 1.3.26-6
libgraphicsmagick++-q16-12 - 1.3.26-6
libgraphicsmagick-q16-3 - 1.3.26-6
No subscription required

criterions.comment: graphicsmagick package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.3.26-6').
